## StyleDeclaration type

Compound type that merges all raw \[Style\] with selector arguments from \[BaseSelector\], optionally a \[\[Reference\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StyleDeclaration = (Style & StyleSelector) | JsonExpr;
```
